example_sentences.eng_trans: truly; realistically; true [faithful] to life; as things really are; as one sees 〈it〉; vividly; graphically.
His confused handwriting bespeaks his present state of mind.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 文字の乱れが彼の今の心境を如実に物語っている。

example_sentences.eng_trans: Miss out on your training, and that will show up clearly in the match result.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 練習をさぼるとそれが試合結果に如実に表れる。

example_sentences.eng_trans: The A-bomb dome clearly illustrates the terror of the atomic bomb.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 原爆ドームは原爆の恐ろしさを如実に表している。

example_sentences.eng_trans: The work portrays the special character of Nobunaga to the life.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: その作品は信長の特異な性格を如実に描いている。

example_sentences.eng_trans: The disastrous state of the Middle East is truthfully depicted in these photographs.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: これらの写真では中東の惨状が如実にとらえられている。
